[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    FLOAT 00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000 is converted into SFP   00000000_00000000_00000000
    FLOAT 00100000_01111111_11111111_00000000 is converted into SFP   00000000_11111111_11111111
    SFP   00000000_00000000_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
    SFP   00000000_11111111_11111111 is converted into FLOAT 00100000_01111111_11111111_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    00000000_00000000_00000000 + 00000000_11111111_11111111 = 00000000_11111111_11111111

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    00000000_00000000_00000000 * 00000000_11111111_11111111 = 00000000_00000000_00000000
